archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0730
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer when l need to clarify some charges on my account, I want to be able to have a full paper-less record of the billing information that I can search and filter, so that I can quickly get the answers I need wherever I am

properties.value: For Horizion 1 we assume here simple digital invoice presentation with filters (e.g. MSISDN, account, user). Is it what is expected here?

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
